cards.title: Evaluate upgrade from clawdbot â†’ openclaw (side-by-side) to enable Opus 4.6
cards.description: Someday: assess risks/benefits of switching from npm package clawdbot (2026.1.24-3) to openclaw (2026.2.3-1+). Goal: Opus 4.6 allowlist + improvements. Plan: backup config, install side-by-side, verify gateway status, migrate if safe.
